infovizion.sense.host.description: Sense host, exactly as in certificates, exported from QMC (and used in Qlik Sense installation)

infovizion.sense.port.description: Qlik Sense http port (https port can not be used)

infovizion.sense.userDir.description: Sense user dir of user who will be running reload tasks

infovizion.sense.userId.description: Sense user who will be running reload tasks (should have sufficient security rights for that)

infovizion.sense.logDir.description: Sense host, exactly as in certificates, exported from QMC (and used in Qlik Sense installation)

infovizion.qlikview.executable.description: Full path to QlikView Desktop executable

infovizion.sense.logArchivedDir.description: Sense host, exactly as in certificates, exported from QMC (and used in Qlik Sense installation)

infovizion.sense.sertificatesDir.description: Sense host, exactly as in certificates, exported from QMC (and used in Qlik Sense installation)

infovizion.sense.etlMapDir.description: Directory of etl data files with information about links between QVS script file and corresponding Qlik Sense Reload Task
